[[Universal Channel (Asia)|Universal Channel]] | sat serv 1 = [[Indovision]] ([[Indonesia]]) | sat chan 1 = Channel 165 | sat serv 2 = [[Aora TV]] ([[Indonesia]]) | sat chan 2 = Channel 413 | sat serv 3 = [[OkeVision]] ([[Indonesia]]) | sat chan 3 = Channel 28 | cable serv 1 = [[StarHub TV]] ([[Singapore]]) | cable chan 1 = Channel 526 (SD)
Channel 569 (HD) | adsl serv 1 = [[now TV]] ([[Hong Kong]]) | adsl chan 1 = Channel 124 | iptv serv 2 = [[HKBN_bbTV|bbTV]] ([[Hong Kong]]) | iptv chan 2 = Channel 320 | iptv serv 3 = [[UniFi]] ([[Malaysia]]) | iptv chan 3 = Channel 161 (SD)
Channel 165 (HD) | iptv serv 4 = [[Chunghwa Telecom|Chunghwa Telecom MOD]] ([[Taiwan]]) | iptv chan 4 = Channel 76 (SD/HD) }} '''Syfy Universal''' is an Asian [[cable television]] channel, launched on July 1, 2008, exclusive programs in [[science fiction]], [[fantasy]] and [[Horror film|horror]] and movies. It is owned by [[NBC Universal Global Networks|NBC Universal Asia Networks]]. The channel rebranded as Syfy Universal on 26th July 2010. ==Programming== ===Current=== * [[Angel (TV series)|Angel]] * [[Battlestar Galactica]] * [[Eureka (TV series)|Eureka]] * [[Fact or Faked: Paranormal Files]] * [[Ghost Whisperer]] * [[Haven (TV series)|Haven]] * [[Kyle XY]] * [[Legend of the Seeker]] * [[Sliders]] * [[Smallville (TV series)|Smallville]] * [[Star Trek: The Next Generation]] * [[Stargate Atlantis]] * [[Stargate SG-1]] * [[Stargate Universe]] * [[Xena: Warrior Princess]] [[image:SciFi_channel.svg|thumb|right|Sci Fi logo used from July 1, 2008 to July 25, 2010]] ===Previous=== * [[Andromeda (TV series)|Andromeda]] * [[Babylon 5]] * [[Bionic Woman (2007 TV series)|Bionic Woman]] * [[Blade: The Series]] * [[Dead Like Me]] * [[The Dead Zone (TV series)|The Dead Zone]] * [[Firefly (TV series)|Firefly]] * [[First Wave (TV series)|First Wave]] * [[Heroes (TV series)|Heroes]] * [[Jeremiah (TV series)|Jeremiah]] * [[Medium (TV series)|Medium]] * [[Mutant X (TV series)|Mutant X]] * [[The Outer Limits]]{{Disambiguation needed|date=June 2011}} * [[Quantum Leap (TV series)|Quantum Leap]] * [[Samurai Girl]] * [[Sanctuary (TV series)|Sanctuary]] * [[Tru Calling]] ===Movie Block=== * Sci-Fi Movies ==See also== * [[Syfy]] * [[Sci Fi Channel (Australia)]] ==External links== * [http://syfyuniversal.asia/ Official Website] * [http://www.lyngsat.com/intel8.html Syfy Universal Asia Satellite Feed Intelsat 8] * [http://www.lyngsat.com/apstar2r.html Syfy Universal Asia Satellite Feed Apstar 2R] * [http://www.facebook.com/syfy.asia Syfy Universal Asia on Facebook] * [http://twitter.com/syfyasia Syfy Universal Asia on Twitter] ==Reference== {{NBC Universal Global Networks}} {{NBC Universal}} {{Programs}} [[Category:NBC Universal networks]] [[Category:Science fiction television channels]] [[Category:Hong Kong television]] [[Category:Southeast Asian media]] [[Category:Television channels and stations established in 2008]]
